billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Provides that any shareholder who owns 20% or more of a corporation's shares shall be entitled to elect a proportional share of the board of directors
actClause: AN ACT to amend the business corporation law, in relation to authorizing any shareholder owning twenty percent or more of the issued shares to elect that proportion of the directors which is equal to such shareholder's ownership of corporate shares
